name: T3 - Take the Turn
summary: Take the Turn is a turn based multiplayer racing game for up to four players.

name: T3 Arena
summary: T3 Arena is a fast-paced, easy-to-learn 3v3 shooter. Team up with your friends and charge into battle from your mobile device - anytime, anywhere! Tons of unique heroes, exciting game modes, and effortless auto-firing weapons all await you in the thrilling competitions of the T3 League!

name: T3D: Genesis
summary: The best 3D puzzle game where you will maneuver a shaped combination of blocks falling from the sky to match other blocks and clear the layers.
